cmdproto module¶

Define the set of commands exchanged between a client and server to perform Librarian functions. This module is imported into everything else and should be considered authoritative. Supply a method to construct a valid command dictionary from a variety of input parameter conventions.

class cmdproto.LibrarianCommandProtocol(requestor=None)¶

Bases: object

__call__ will take a full tuple, kwargs, or a dict.
